title: Attack Of The Gryphon (2007) en [NTSC] {Zeerover}
description:
Attack Of the Gryphon <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0494206/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0494206/</a>

This is a conversion of http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3864934/Attack.Of.The.Gryphon.2007.STV.PAL.DVDR-LoRD
Essentially I unpacked the .rar file. 

Then unpacked the .img file.

Then converted from PAL to NTSC, all for a savings to you of many hours and several gigabytes.

As you can see from the data below, we still have a good dvd bitrate at about 30% the size. English only. No menus, subtitles or other languages. Just burn it and play.

It&#039;s up to you folks to seed. I&#039;m off after the first few seeder&#039;s are generated.
Enjoy!
